page.title: 12KENNEDY HALL DUNURE (2)
page.content: Fisherton Church Women's Guild with 30 members meet in Hall one evening a month and in December hold a Party for Senior Citizens,Widows and Widowers. The Scottish Women's Rural Institute, 50 members meet one evening a month and hold two Whist Drives each year. Church Guild and SWRI have joint annual outing. All Clubs hold fund raising events to cover their expenses and give to charities.The Carpet Bowlers play all year.Other groups meet Sept/May.A Committee of villagers run the Kennedy Hall and Park and charge groups a fee for use of facilities.They also rent the Hall to groups outside village and control parking areas,playground,tennis court and putting green in the park facing the sea and castle.
